definitions: To fix (an object) firmly and deeply in a surrounding mass.
To incorporate (a journalist or a member of a military unit) within a larger body, especially a military unit, for the purpose of reporting or observing.
To include (a file, image, or other object) within another document or program.
examples: The archaeologist found ancient tools embedded in the rock.
Reporters were embedded with the troops during the conflict.
You can embed a video directly into your presentation.
